webDes.title: Gram Unnayan Karma
webDes.description: GUK acts as a social activist to create opportunities for the under privileged people by providing multi-dimensional support services for their sustainable socio-economic growth and development.

heading.title: NGO Financial Services
heading.description: GUK's microfinance programs provide inclusive financing, especially to **disadvantaged women**, for sustainable socio-economic growth and enterprise development in line with Micro-credit Regulatory Authority (MRA) rules.

card.title: Apply for a GUK Loan
card.description: Start your journey with GUK by applying for a loan today. Simple, fast, and designed to meet your needs.

loans.title: Basic Loan
loans.description: A simple and flexible loan option designed to cover your essential financial needs with easy repayment terms.

loans.title: Business Loan
loans.description: Empower your business with financing tailored to entrepreneurs and companies aiming to grow and expand.

loans.title: Education Loan
loans.description: Invest in your future with loans designed to cover tuition fees, books, and living expenses for students.

faqs.q: What documents are required to apply for a loan?
faqs.a: You will typically need proof of identity, proof of income, and address verification.

faqs.q: How long does loan approval take?
faqs.a: Approval usually takes between 24 to 48 hours, depending on the type of loan.

faqs.q: Can I repay my loan early?
faqs.a: Yes, you can repay your loan early without any hidden charges in most cases.
